markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spirit Strikes](/Feats.aspx?ID=1374) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=15) empowers you to bring death to all forms of life and unlife, exploiting their weaknesses. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes are [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) and deal 1 additional negative damage to living creatures and 1 additional positive damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).
name: Spirit Strikes
